wikipedia_page.main: Matthew Thomas Walls  (born 20 April 1998) is a British road and track cyclist, who currently rides for UCI WorldTeam Bora–Hansgrohe. Walls won the gold medal in the men's omnium event at the 2020 Summer Olympics.
